title: Fix article sorting â€” latest first

requirements.text: Ensure the backend returns all news articles sorted in descending order by `createdAt` (newest first). Audit the query/filter function in `backend/main.mo` that returns article lists and confirm the sort is applied correctly before returning results.

quotes: articles still not sorted by latest first?

acceptanceCriteria: The backend function that returns article lists sorts results by `createdAt` in descending order.
A newly added article appears first in the returned list.
Older articles appear after newer ones consistently.

requirements.text: Ensure that all frontend pages that display article lists (HomePage, PoliticalNewsPage, MovieNewsPage, TopStoriesSidebar, BreakingNewsTicker) render articles in the exact order returned by the backend without any client-side re-sorting or reversal that could override the newest-first order.

quotes: articles still not sorted by latest first?

acceptanceCriteria: HomePage hero and section lists show the most recently created article first.
PoliticalNewsPage and MovieNewsPage lists show newest articles at the top.
TopStoriesSidebar shows the 5 most recent articles in descending date order.
BreakingNewsTicker ticker shows the latest 10 articles newest first.
No client-side sort or reverse is applied that contradicts backend order.

constraints: Do not change the article data schema or existing fields.
Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Adding new article fields or changing the data model.
Pagination logic changes beyond what is needed to fix sort order.
Any UI redesign or visual changes.
